channel.title: Posts on The Euro Diaries 2024
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on The Euro Diaries 2024

item.title: Portugal Squad
item.description: Portugal Squad Reaction Alright. Former Euro winners. Quite possibly the last dance from Ronaldo in a major tournament, and also Pepe too. Knowing Ronaldo, he’ll want to be there for 2 more years for the World Cup, but I think it’s a stretch even for him. I’ll respect it, but I feel he’ll have not been as good as he is relative to now. And also I have no trust in Roberto Martinez at all given what he ruined with Belgium.

item.title: Spain Squad
item.description: Spain Squad Reaction Alright. Got some good talent here and experience too. They’re in a group with Italy and Croatia so it’s going to be tough. Let’s go through each of them for this 4-3-3 formation that they’re obviously going to go with Goalkeeper I think this is a nailed on pick. David Raya. Really good debut season with the Golden Glove with Arsenal in the Premier League. The quality of the others are good as well with Unai Simon and Alex Remiro but Raya is definitely a shoo in.

item.title: Italy Squad
item.description: Italy Provisional Squad The major news here is Scalvini will miss this tournament because of a major injury he just got recently Alright. The defending champions of the Euros. It is hard to gauge them because they actually FAILED to qualify for the World Cup 2 years back but they’ve got some good players now and some good young talents as well. And as always you’ve got Fede Chiesa as well involved too.

item.title: England Squad
item.description: England Provisional Squad I’ll be reacting to all the available squads till now and add the final squad once it’s announced in the same page. Starting with England. Probably the biggest favorites to win this tournament which isn’t a surprise given the talent they’ve got and with this squad it shows. The only gripe I have is the man behind them: Yes I mean Boregate. Because honestly for the talent they have they’ve got probably the worst ever coach to lead it.
